titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the Federal policy pertaining to the disposal of low-level radioactive waste.

bill.summary: 5/19/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that all radioactive waste site selection and related activities conducted by the States or regional compacts should be suspended until congressional committees hold investigative oversight hearings regarding the adequacy of Federal low-level radioactive waste policy. Cites specific areas for congressional review.
